parametrized_description: A party organizer needs to transport at least MinPeople people using limousines and buses. Each limousine can carry LimousineCapacity people and each bus can carry BusCapacity people. At least MinLimousineFraction of the vehicles used must be limousines. The objective is to minimize the total number of limousines and buses used.

LimousineCapacity.description: Number of people a limousine can carry

BusCapacity.description: Number of people a bus can carry

MinPeople.description: Minimum number of people to transport

MinLimousineFraction.description: Minimum fraction of vehicles that must be limousines

PeopleLimousines.description: The number of people assigned to limousines

PeopleBuses.description: The number of people assigned to buses

constraints.description: Each limousine can carry LimousineCapacity people.
Each bus can carry BusCapacity people.
The total number of people transported by limousines and buses must be at least MinPeople.
At least MinLimousineFraction of the vehicles used must be limousines.

objective.description: Minimize the total number of limousines and buses used.
